name: Seven Years' War
desc: Maria Theresa forms an alliance with Country(France) and Country(Russia) to retake Silesia. New World conflicts between Country(France) and Country(Great Britain).

name: War of Austrian Succession
desc: Frederick II invades the Country(Austria)n province of Silesia.

name: War of Spanish Succession
desc: The Grand Alliance fights Country(Spain) and Country(France) to prevent the unification of the Spanish and French crowns.

name: Thirty Years' War
desc: Series of religious conflicts between Catholic and Protestants and political conflicts between Bourbons and Habsburgs.

name: French Religious Wars
desc: Civil war between Huguenots and Catholics sparked by the Catholic attack of Henry of Navarre's wedding.

name: The Netherlands War of Independence
desc: Dutch war for independence from Country(Spain).

name: German Religious Wars
desc: Civil War between Protestant princes and the Country(Holy Roman Empire).

name: Swiss Religious Wars
desc: Civil War between Protestant and Catholic cantons.
